panels.title: Primary Incident Classification (Cloud/Telecom/Networking)
panels.description: Distribution of non-alert incidents across primary technology categories

targets.rawSql:
WITH classified AS (
  SELECT
    CASE
      WHEN LOWER(COALESCE("TKT-Title",'') || ' ' || COALESCE("TKT-Description",''))
           LIKE ANY(ARRAY['%network drive%','%share%','%file server%','%shared drive%','%file share%'])
      THEN 'Cloud'
      WHEN LOWER(COALESCE("TKT-Title",'') || ' ' || COALESCE("TKT-Description",''))
           LIKE ANY(ARRAY['%phone%','%pbx%','%call%','%voip%','%teams meeting%','%meeting room%'])
      THEN 'Telecommunications'
      WHEN LOWER(COALESCE("TKT-Title",'') || ' ' || COALESCE("TKT-Description",''))
           LIKE ANY(ARRAY['%vpn%','%firewall%','%switch%','%router%','%wifi%','%wi-fi%','%access point%','%ethernet%'])
      THEN 'Networking'
      ELSE 'Cloud'
    END AS category
  FROM servicedesk.tickets
  WHERE "TKT-Category" <> 'Alert'
  AND "TKT-Created Time" >= '2025-07-01'
)
SELECT category, COUNT(*) as count
FROM classified
GROUP BY category
ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC;

panels.title: Cloud Incidents
panels.description: Total incidents classified as Cloud (including file shares, SaaS, etc.)

targets.rawSql:
WITH classified AS (
  SELECT
    CASE
      WHEN LOWER(COALESCE("TKT-Title",'') || ' ' || COALESCE("TKT-Description",''))
           LIKE ANY(ARRAY['%network drive%','%share%','%file server%','%shared drive%','%file share%'])
      THEN 'Cloud'
      WHEN LOWER(COALESCE("TKT-Title",'') || ' ' || COALESCE("TKT-Description",''))
           LIKE ANY(ARRAY['%phone%','%pbx%','%call%','%voip%','%teams meeting%','%meeting room%'])
      THEN 'Telecommunications'
      WHEN LOWER(COALESCE("TKT-Title",'') || ' ' || COALESCE("TKT-Description",''))
           LIKE ANY(ARRAY['%vpn%','%firewall%','%switch%','%router%','%wifi%','%wi-fi%','%access point%','%ethernet%'])
      THEN 'Networking'
      ELSE 'Cloud'
    END AS category
  FROM servicedesk.tickets
  WHERE "TKT-Category" <> 'Alert'
  AND "TKT-Created Time" >= '2025-07-01'
)
SELECT COUNT(*) as value
FROM classified
WHERE category = 'Cloud';

panels.title: Networking Incidents
panels.description: Total incidents classified as Networking (VPN, firewall, switches, WiFi, etc.)

targets.rawSql:
WITH classified AS (
  SELECT
    CASE
      WHEN LOWER(COALESCE("TKT-Title",'') || ' ' || COALESCE("TKT-Description",''))
           LIKE ANY(ARRAY['%network drive%','%share%','%file server%','%shared drive%','%file share%'])
      THEN 'Cloud'
      WHEN LOWER(COALESCE("TKT-Title",'') || ' ' || COALESCE("TKT-Description",''))
           LIKE ANY(ARRAY['%phone%','%pbx%','%call%','%voip%','%teams meeting%','%meeting room%'])
      THEN 'Telecommunications'

           LIKE ANY(ARRAY['%vpn%','%firewall%','%switch%','%router%','%wifi%','%wi-fi%','%access point%','%ethernet%'])

    END AS category
  FROM servicedesk.tickets

FROM classified
WHERE category = 'Networking';

panels.title: Classification Trends Over Time
panels.description: Weekly trend showing incident distribution across categories

targets.rawSql:
WITH classified AS (
  SELECT
    DATE_TRUNC('week', "TKT-Created Time") as time,
    CASE
      WHEN LOWER(COALESCE("TKT-Title",'') || ' ' || COALESCE("TKT-Description",''))
           LIKE ANY(ARRAY['%network drive%','%share%','%file server%','%shared drive%','%file share%'])
      THEN 'Cloud'
      WHEN LOWER(COALESCE("TKT-Title",'') || ' ' || COALESCE("TKT-Description",''))
           LIKE ANY(ARRAY['%phone%','%pbx%','%call%','%voip%','%teams meeting%','%meeting room%'])
      THEN 'Telecommunications'
      WHEN LOWER(COALESCE("TKT-Title",'') || ' ' || COALESCE("TKT-Description",''))
           LIKE ANY(ARRAY['%vpn%','%firewall%','%switch%','%router%','%wifi%','%wi-fi%','%access point%','%ethernet%'])
      THEN 'Networking'
      ELSE 'Cloud'
    END AS category
  FROM servicedesk.tickets
  WHERE "TKT-Category" <> 'Alert'
  AND "TKT-Created Time" >= '2025-07-01'
)
SELECT time,
  SUM(CASE WHEN category = 'Cloud' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as "Cloud",
  SUM(CASE WHEN category = 'Telecommunications' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as "Telecommunications",
  SUM(CASE WHEN category = 'Networking' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as "Networking"
FROM classified
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time;

WITH networking_tickets AS (
  SELECT "TKT-Title", "TKT-Description"
  FROM servicedesk.tickets
  WHERE "TKT-Category" <> 'Alert'
  AND "TKT-Created Time" >= '2025-07-01'
  AND LOWER(COALESCE("TKT-Title",'') || ' ' || COALESCE("TKT-Description",''))
      NOT LIKE ANY(ARRAY['%network drive%','%share%','%file server%','%shared drive%','%file share%'])
  AND LOWER(COALESCE("TKT-Title",'') || ' ' || COALESCE("TKT-Description",''))
      LIKE ANY(ARRAY['%vpn%','%firewall%','%switch%','%router%','%wifi%','%wi-fi%','%access point%','%ethernet%'])
)
SELECT
  CASE
    WHEN LOWER(COALESCE("TKT-Title",'') || ' ' || COALESCE("TKT-Description",'')) LIKE '%vpn%' THEN 'VPN Issues'
    WHEN LOWER(COALESCE("TKT-Title",'') || ' ' || COALESCE("TKT-Description",'')) LIKE '%firewall%' THEN 'Firewall'
    WHEN LOWER(COALESCE("TKT-Title",'') || ' ' || COALESCE("TKT-Description",'')) LIKE '%switch%' OR
         LOWER(COALESCE("TKT-Title",'') || ' ' || COALESCE("TKT-Description",'')) LIKE '%router%' THEN 'Switch/Router Hardware'
    WHEN LOWER(COALESCE("TKT-Title",'') || ' ' || COALESCE("TKT-Description",'')) LIKE '%wifi%' OR
         LOWER(COALESCE("TKT-Title",'') || ' ' || COALESCE("TKT-Description",'')) LIKE '%wi-fi%' OR
         LOWER(COALESCE("TKT-Title",'') || ' ' || COALESCE("TKT-Description",'')) LIKE '%access point%' THEN 'WiFi Connectivity'
    WHEN LOWER(COALESCE("TKT-Title",'') || ' ' || COALESCE("TKT-Description",'')) LIKE '%ethernet%' THEN 'Ethernet/Cabling'
    ELSE 'Other Networking'
  END AS subcategory,
  COUNT(*) as count
FROM networking_tickets
GROUP BY subcategory
ORDER BY count DESC;

WITH telecom_tickets AS (
  SELECT "TKT-Title", "TKT-Description"
  FROM servicedesk.tickets
  WHERE "TKT-Category" <> 'Alert'
  AND "TKT-Created Time" >= '2025-07-01'
  AND LOWER(COALESCE("TKT-Title",'') || ' ' || COALESCE("TKT-Description",''))
      LIKE ANY(ARRAY['%phone%','%pbx%','%call%','%voip%','%teams meeting%','%meeting room%'])
)
SELECT
  CASE
    WHEN LOWER(COALESCE("TKT-Title",'') || ' ' || COALESCE("TKT-Description",'')) LIKE '%phone%'
         OR LOWER(COALESCE("TKT-Title",'') || ' ' || COALESCE("TKT-Description",'')) LIKE '%call%' THEN 'Calling Issues'
    WHEN LOWER(COALESCE("TKT-Title",'') || ' ' || COALESCE("TKT-Description",'')) LIKE '%pbx%' THEN 'PBX System'
    WHEN LOWER(COALESCE("TKT-Title",'') || ' ' || COALESCE("TKT-Description",'')) LIKE '%voip%' THEN 'VoIP'
    WHEN LOWER(COALESCE("TKT-Title",'') || ' ' || COALESCE("TKT-Description",'')) LIKE '%teams meeting%'
         OR LOWER(COALESCE("TKT-Title",'') || ' ' || COALESCE("TKT-Description",'')) LIKE '%meeting room%' THEN 'Conference/Meeting Rooms'
    ELSE 'Other Telecom'
  END AS subcategory,
  COUNT(*) as count
FROM telecom_tickets
GROUP BY subcategory
ORDER BY count DESC;

panels.title: File Share Incidents (Cloud Category)
panels.description: Network drive and file server incidents classified as Cloud

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  "TKT-Ticket ID" as "Ticket",
  "TKT-Title" as "Title",
  "TKT-Created Time" as "Created",
  "TKT-Status" as "Status",
  "TKT-Severity" as "Priority"
FROM servicedesk.tickets
WHERE "TKT-Category" <> 'Alert'
AND "TKT-Created Time" >= '2025-07-01'
AND LOWER(COALESCE("TKT-Title",'') || ' ' || COALESCE("TKT-Description",''))
    LIKE ANY(ARRAY['%network drive%','%share%','%file server%','%shared drive%','%file share%'])
ORDER BY "TKT-Created Time" DESC
LIMIT 50;

WITH networking_tickets AS (
  SELECT *
  FROM servicedesk.tickets
  WHERE "TKT-Category" <> 'Alert'
  AND "TKT-Created Time" >= '2025-07-01'
  AND LOWER(COALESCE("TKT-Title",'') || ' ' || COALESCE("TKT-Description",''))
      NOT LIKE ANY(ARRAY['%network drive%','%share%','%file server%','%shared drive%','%file share%'])
  AND LOWER(COALESCE("TKT-Title",'') || ' ' || COALESCE("TKT-Description",''))
      LIKE ANY(ARRAY['%vpn%','%firewall%','%switch%','%router%','%wifi%','%wi-fi%','%access point%','%ethernet%'])
)
SELECT
  "TKT-Ticket ID" as "Ticket",
  "TKT-Title" as "Title",
  "TKT-Created Time" as "Created",
  "TKT-Status" as "Status",
  CASE
    WHEN LOWER(COALESCE("TKT-Title",'') || ' ' || COALESCE("TKT-Description",'')) LIKE '%vpn%' THEN 'VPN'
    WHEN LOWER(COALESCE("TKT-Title",'') || ' ' || COALESCE("TKT-Description",'')) LIKE '%firewall%' THEN 'Firewall'
    WHEN LOWER(COALESCE("TKT-Title",'') || ' ' || COALESCE("TKT-Description",'')) LIKE '%switch%' OR
         LOWER(COALESCE("TKT-Title",'') || ' ' || COALESCE("TKT-Description",'')) LIKE '%router%' THEN 'Switch/Router'
    WHEN LOWER(COALESCE("TKT-Title",'') || ' ' || COALESCE("TKT-Description",'')) LIKE '%wifi%' THEN 'WiFi'
    ELSE 'Other'
  END AS "Type"
FROM networking_tickets
ORDER BY "TKT-Created Time" DESC
LIMIT 50;

WITH telecom_tickets AS (
  SELECT *
  FROM servicedesk.tickets
  WHERE "TKT-Category" <> 'Alert'
  AND "TKT-Created Time" >= '2025-07-01'
  AND LOWER(COALESCE("TKT-Title",'') || ' ' || COALESCE("TKT-Description",''))
      LIKE ANY(ARRAY['%phone%','%pbx%','%call%','%voip%','%teams meeting%','%meeting room%'])
)
SELECT
  "TKT-Ticket ID" as "Ticket",
  "TKT-Title" as "Title",
  "TKT-Created Time" as "Created",
  "TKT-Status" as "Status",
  CASE
    WHEN LOWER(COALESCE("TKT-Title",'') || ' ' || COALESCE("TKT-Description",'')) LIKE '%phone%' THEN 'Phone'
    WHEN LOWER(COALESCE("TKT-Title",'') || ' ' || COALESCE("TKT-Description",'')) LIKE '%call%' THEN 'Calling'
    WHEN LOWER(COALESCE("TKT-Title",'') || ' ' || COALESCE("TKT-Description",'')) LIKE '%pbx%' THEN 'PBX'
    WHEN LOWER(COALESCE("TKT-Title",'') || ' ' || COALESCE("TKT-Description",'')) LIKE '%voip%' THEN 'VoIP'
    WHEN LOWER(COALESCE("TKT-Title",'') || ' ' || COALESCE("TKT-Description",'')) LIKE '%meeting%' THEN 'Meeting Room'
    ELSE 'Other'
  END AS "Type"
FROM telecom_tickets
ORDER BY "TKT-Created Time" DESC
LIMIT 50;
